description: Luno is the brother of Sorin, a former lord of the Eclipse Castle in the Johto Region. Luno was jealous of his brother`s high-ranking position, so he attacked him to try to dethrone him and become the lord of the castle. He was ultimately stopped by Sorin`s Espeon and Umbreon. Since that time, the Eclipse Castle emblem has been two half circles, one featuring Espeon and Umbreon.
name: Tsukiya
